---
title: "Non-overlapping Windows Analysis"
params:
  # general
  rmddir: "~/Documents/SimNOW/rmd"
  prefix: "db"
  outdir: "~/Documents/simulation/debug"
  thread: 1
  redo: TRUE
  
  # sequence simulation
  msdir: "~/Documents/msdir/ms"
  ms_params: ""
  ms_r: 0
  ms_l: 1000000
  
  iqtree2dir: "~/Documents/iqtree-2.2.2.2-MacOSX/bin/iqtree2"
  alisim_model: "JC"
  alisim_scale: 0.001
  outgroup: ""
  
  # non-overlapping window analysis
  window_size: !r c()
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ape)
library(data.table)
library(doSNOW)
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(hash)
library(log4r)
library(seqinr)

# create outdir
currentdir <- paste(params$outdir, "/", params$prefix, sep="")
if (!dir.exists(currentdir)) {
  dir.create(currentdir, recursive = T)
}

# create log file
fn_log <- paste(params$outdir, "/", params$prefix, "/", params$prefix, ".log", sep="")
log_appender <- file_appender(fn_log, append = TRUE, layout = default_log_layout())
fn_logger <- log4r::logger(threshold = "INFO", appenders = log_appender)
if (params$redo == TRUE) {
  unlink(fn_log)
}

if (!file.exists(fn_log)) {
  write.table("SimNOW", file=fn_log, quote=F, row.names=F, col.names=F)
}

knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = currentdir)
```
